title: Design On-line: Providing On-line Access to Registers and Representations of Designs in the Board of Trade Design Register
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The findings of this study have been used as a basis for additional funding awards and have changed how this arts and humanities resource will be accessed in the future. Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software),Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections,Other Cultural,Policy & public services
findingsText: This grant explored the possibilities of visual search technologies for cultural heritage collections, and enhanced access to the Board of Trade collection of designs through improved transcription and digitisation. The findings of this study determined the best technologies for visual search, and assessed the usefulness of the Board of Trade design collection for potential users. Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections,Other
